translations: [植保] 溃疡病；口疮；腐败的原由，弊害

sentences.sentence: In gardens, cankers are most prominent on apples and pear trees.
sentences.translation: 花园树木中患溃疡病最多的是苹果树和梨树。

sentences.sentence: Mexican types are immune to trunk cankers but the fruit is not.
sentences.translation: 墨西哥类型免疫主干溃疡病，但果实是不是。

sentences.sentence: In the third watch of the night he had the knowledge of the exhaustion of cankers, knowing that he had eradicated all defilements and made an end of ill.
sentences.translation: 在第三次省察中，他知道烦恼已断尽，明白他已完全根除了诸漏，以及结束了诸苦。
